ComicInfo.Summary: TV's smash sci-fi hit comes to BOOM! In what Eureka creator Andrew Cosby calls 'Season 1.5, ' Cosby and writer Brendan Hay (The Daily Show) bring all-new stories from everybody's favorite town of eccentric geniuses! Things start off with a bang when something menacing escapes from Global Dynamics, and it has a target! It's up to Carter and Jo to put together the pieces, but will elements from Jo's past stop her from getting the job done?
